Summary: Eastbound Bx12 buses use W 207th St instead of Isham St; you will experience a few extra turns but no eastbound stops are missed
Description:
Eastbound Bx12 buses use W 207th St instead of Isham St; you will experience a few extra turns but no eastbound stops are missed
Please allow additional travel time.

What's happening?
Emergency road work

Summary: Westbound M31 and M57 stop on E 57th St at Madison Ave has been relocated
Description:
Westbound M31 and M57 stop on E 57th St at Madison Ave has been relocated
Buses are stopping on E 57th St at Madison Ave, before the intersection. (see map)

What's happening?
Construction

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area

Summary: Q101 buses are detoured in both directions because of downed power wires on Steinway St between Astoria Blvd and Ditmars Blvd.
Description:
Q101 buses are detoured in both directions because of downed power wires on Steinway St between Astoria Blvd and Ditmars Blvd.
While detoured, northbound buses will not make stops along Steinway St from 23rd Rd to 23rd Ave. Stops will be made as requested along Astoria Blvd S and Ditmars Blvd.
Southbound buses will not make stops along Steinway St from 23rd Ave to Astoria Blvd. Stops will be made as requested along 23rd Ave and Astoria Blvd N.
Note: Bus arrival information may not be accurate while buses are detoured.
Use this link to view a map of the detour

Summary: Southbound M1 and M2 stop on 5th Ave at E 109th St is being bypassed
Description:
Southbound M1 and M2 stop on 5th Ave at E 109th St is being bypassed
For service, use the stop on 5th Ave between E 107th St and  E 108th St instead.

What's happening?
Sidewalk construction

Summary: Southbound M1, M2, M3 and M4 stop on 5th Ave at E 104th St is closed
Description:
Southbound M1, M2, M3 and M4 stop on 5th Ave at E 104th St is closed
For service, consider the stops on 5th Ave at E 106th St or E 102nd St instead.

What's happening?
Sidewalk restoration

Summary: S40 and S90 buses will not make the Chelsea Ave/Bloomfield Ave stops in either direction due to flooding at that location.
Description:
S40 and S90 buses will not make the Chelsea Ave/Bloomfield Ave stops in either direction due to flooding at that location.
Use the 5th St/Amazon Fulfillment Center stop instead.
Note: Bus arrival information may not be available while buses are detoured.
See stops skipped here

Summary: Eastbound Q4, Q5, Q84 and Q85 stop on Merrick Blvd at 104th Ave is being bypassed, use the stop on Merrick Blvd at 107th Ave instead
Description:
Eastbound Q4, Q5, Q84 and Q85 stop on Merrick Blvd at 104th Ave is being bypassed, use the stop on Merrick Blvd at 107th Ave instead

Summary: Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Description:
Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Queens Bus Network Redesign service improvements will be phased in by route on June 29 and August 31, 2025.

Until then, know that your bus route will still serve current stops, but some signs will reflect future service.

Use the MTA app or BusTime to plan your trip.

Learn more about the project at mta.info/queensbus

Summary: Northbound M104 stop on Broadway between W 84th St and W 85th St is being bypassed, use nearby stops on Broadway at W 82nd St or W 86th St instead
Description:
Northbound M104 stop on Broadway between W 84th St and W 85th St is being bypassed, use nearby stops on Broadway at W 82nd St or W 86th St instead
See a map of nearby stops.

What?s happening?
